definition: to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia

sentences.english: Unable to control themselves, some teenagers get hooked by online games.
sentences.chinese: 由於缺乏自控能力，一些青少年迷戀於網上游戲。

sentences.english: It is the same as WZR No Brush self-controlled motor soft starter.
sentences.chinese: 與WZR無刷自控電機軟起動器方式一致。

sentences.english: Research indicates that self-monitoring increases the probability of keeping the resolution.
sentences.chinese: 研究證明，自控可以助長遵守決議的可能性。

sentences.english: In what areas do you need to develop for self-control?
sentences.chinese: 你在哪些方面需要培養自控力呢？

sentences.english: Storage and transportation automatic control system design in the port tank yard is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了港口液鹼罐區貯運自控系統的設計。

sentences.english: Emotional states are likely to affect our self-control in all kinds of complicated ways.
sentences.chinese: 情緒狀態通過各種負責的途徑影響着自控力。

sentences.english: "Identical twins are not identical on self-control, " she says.
sentences.chinese: “一樣的雙胞胎自控能力並不相同，”她說。

sentences.english: Something as simple as a credit card can weaken self-control.
sentences.chinese: 比如說一張簡單的信用卡就會減弱我們的自控力。

sentences.english: People with self-control watch their words.
sentences.chinese: 有自控的人小心自己說出來的話。

sentences.english: People with self-control stick to their schedule.
sentences.chinese: 有自控的人能堅持自己的做事計劃。

sentences.english: At last, the drop-off of the carrier rocket means the satellite has entered its self-guided phase.
sentences.chinese: 最後，助推火箭的脫落意味着衛星已經進入自控狀態。

sentences.english: It could teach some of these self-control and willpower skills I’m talking about.
sentences.chinese: 它還可以教你我說過的一些自控能力和意志力。

sentences.english: Constant temperature recycling system can be fixed with automatic temperature control and automatic back-flow.
sentences.chinese: 配有恆溫循環系統，溫度自控，自動迴流。
認知任務的增加將減弱自控力。

sentences.english: All patients were treated with patient-controlled intravenous analgesia(PCIA) prepared with the corresponding drugs above.
sentences.chinese: 各組患者分別接受上述藥物配製的病人自控靜脈鎮痛。

sentences.english: People with self-control manage their money.
sentences.chinese: 有自控的人會管理他們的錢財。

definition: to examine oneself/to reflect on one's shortcomings/introspection/self-awareness/self-criticism
to quit/to give up (a bad habit)
self-respect/self-love/self-regard/regard for oneself/to cherish one's good name/to take good care of one's health
to have an urge/to be impetuous/impulse/urge
